LanguageData.Miho_BasicFactory.label: Basic Miho Factory
LanguageData.Miho_BasicFactory.description: Learn the basic skills to produce ceramics.

Miho_BasicFactory.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->learned basic industrial skills from the stars
subject_story->manufactured parts with their psychic powers

LanguageData.Miho_HeavyFactory.label: Heavy Miho Industry
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyFactory.description: Weapons, armor, combat drones, anything can be mass-produced. Learn how to build a Miho Mech Factory to produce mechanoids.

Miho_HeavyFactory.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->learned heavy industry from the stars
subject_story->put all of the settlement's components into an automated factory

LanguageData.Miho_MechHack.label: Mechanite Hacking
LanguageData.Miho_MechHack.description: Learn how to hack small mechanoids not visible to the naked eye. These virus like machines can also be viewed as biomechanites.
LanguageData.Miho_MechCore.label: Large Mechanite Core
LanguageData.Miho_MechCore.description: Learn how to fabricate cores for superior mechanoids.
LanguageData.Miho_Persona.label: Harmonic Object Reduction Theory
LanguageData.Miho_Persona.description: Learn techniques for imbuing mechanical devices with a quantum soul.

Miho_Persona.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->wrote about the transcendental rites of tribal peoples
subject_story->helped designing the artificial intelligence of advanced mechanoids

LanguageData.Miho_Celestial.label: Archotech Mass Weaving
LanguageData.Miho_Celestial.description: A large-scale alloy factory supported by an AI persona core. You will be able to create Celetial Scales by alloying the nucleus of a neutron star with exotic matter.
LanguageData.Miho_Drone.label: Miho Drone
LanguageData.Miho_Drone.description: Learn how to develop basic mechanoids for agriculture.

Miho_Drone.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->revolutionized simple manual labor by using mechanoids

LanguageData.Miho_GuardDrone.label: Basic Combat Drone
LanguageData.Miho_GuardDrone.description: Learn the technology to combine mechanoids and projectile weapons.

Miho_GuardDrone.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->build something terrifying to control humans
subject_story->simply added a simple automatic turret to a mechanoid but it turned out to be a revolution in warfare

LanguageData.Miho_LightWarDrone.label: Advanced Combat Drone
LanguageData.Miho_LightWarDrone.description: This technology allows you to develop mechanoids for full-scale warfare.

Miho_LightWarDrone.generalRules.rulesStr.li: subject_story->realized that composite armor and self-propelled guns were effective in mechanoid warfare

LanguageData.Miho_CommandDrone.label: Support Drone
LanguageData.Miho_CommandDrone.description: Develop a support type mechanoid that can heal you.

Miho_CommandDrone.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->developed support mechanoids after many foxes died on the battlefield
subject_story->made mechanoids to replace foxes but they were too expensive

LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarDrone.label: Artillery Drone
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarDrone.description: Learn how to create mechanoids equipped with a rocket launcher battery.

Miho_HeavyWarDrone.generalRules.rulesStr.li: subject_story->realized the appeal of superior firepower
subject_story->imagined a cute fox in officer uniform shouting "Two, three, FIRE! Get the hell out of here you bastards!"

LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarBattery.label: Cluster Artillery Drone
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarBattery.description: Learn how to create mechanoids equipped with a cluster rocket launcher.

Miho_HeavyWarBattery.generalRules.rulesS.li: subject_story->imagined a cute fox in officer uniform shouting "Two, three, FIRE! Get blasted to bits you bastards!"

LanguageData.Miho_HeavyPlasma.label: Miho Plasma Assault Cannon
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyPlasma.description: Develop the most efficient and destructive long range plasma rifle.

Miho_HeavyPlasma.generalRules.rulesStrin.li: subject_story->came to the conclusion that fighting the empire effectively required working in tandem with mechanoids

LanguageData.Miho_Weapon.label: Miho Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon.description: Learn how to make simple Miho weapons.

Miho_Weapon.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->done a lot of work on melting armor plates

LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWeapon.label: Miho Combat Armor
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWeapon.description: Learn how to make various kinds of combat armor.

Miho_HeavyWeapon.generalRules.rulesStrin.li: subject_story->concluded that more firepower is needed
subject_story->manufactured weapons of mass destruction with special components

LanguageData.Miho_VerminControlWeapon.label: Vermin Control Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_VerminControlWeapon.description: It has always been like that: Pesky, ugly creatures keep swarming around you like sea water. With this we have a great weapon to kill them.

Miho_VerminControlWeapon.generalRules.ru.li: subject_story->developed a weapon to get rid of less-favored creatures
subject_story->effectively reduced the number of hostile individuals
subject_gerund->developing a shotgun for vermin extermination

LanguageData.Miho_PlasmaWeapon.label: Miho Plasma Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_PlasmaWeapon.description: Develop powerful plasma weapons for ranged and close quarter combat.

Miho_PlasmaWeapon.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->desired firepower equal to the immense heat of a star

LanguageData.Miho_ApparelBasic.label: Miho Apparel
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelBasic.description: No one wants to be naked. Learn how to make simple clothing.

Miho_ApparelBasic.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->thought about this culture of foxes that's hard to describe
subject_story->designed apparel that is a bit cuter as a result of indulging in basic narcissism

LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAdvanced.label: Miho Advanced Apparel
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAdvanced.description: Bring a bit more variety to your closet!.

Miho_ApparelAdvanced.generalRules.rulesS.li: subject_story->came up with better fashion designs meant for beautiful foxes
subject_story->designed better fashon designs for more cuteness-obsessed foxes

LanguageData.Miho_Silk.label: Ebonsilk
LanguageData.Miho_Silk.description: Learn how to produce soft and heat-resistant silk. This is used for more complex clothing and armor.

Miho_Silk.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->discovered fire-resistant silk, which was perfect for military use

LanguageData.Miho_ApparelEltex.label: Miho Eltex Apparel
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelEltex.description: Learn how to craft complex clothing that increase the limits of your psychic powers.

Miho_ApparelEltex.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->discovered a mysterious phenomenon that reduces neural heat
subject_story->aided in the development of mechanite related psychic powers
subject_gerund->creating psycast enhancing clothing for foxes

LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAssassin.label: Miho Assassin Armor
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAssassin.description: Learn how to craft assassin armor that enhances physical capabilities.

Miho_ApparelAssassin.generalRules.rulesS.li: subject_story->developed a suit that supresses psychic powers but in turn enhances physical capabilities
subject_gerund->developing psychic supression methods while physical strength

LanguageData.Miho_ApparelSorcerees.label: Miho Sorceress Armor
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelSorcerees.description: Learn how to craft sorcerer clothing that enhances psychic capabilities.

Miho_ApparelSorcerees.generalRules.rules.li: subject_story->designed functional clothing after being commissioned by high ranking psychics
